description: This table contains the Presurgery Event information for the Surgical Log (ORL).

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the line record.

columns.name: PRE_SURG_EVENT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The pre-surgery event type.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: PRE_SURG_EVENT_DAT
columns.description: The date on which the pre-surgery event occurred.

columns.name: PRE_SURG_EVENT_TIM
columns.description: The time at which the pre-surgery event occurred.

columns.name: PRE_SURG_EVENT_LEN
columns.description: The length of the pre-surgery event.
